serviceName: AWS Billing And Cost Management Pricing Calculator

actions.name: CreateBillEstimate
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new bill estimate. Charge is incurred for successful bill estimates

actions.name: CreateBillScenario
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new bill scenario

actions.name: CreateBillScenarioCommitmentModification
actions.description: Grants permission to create new commitments or remove existing commitment from a specified bill scenario

actions.name: CreateBillScenarioUsageModification
actions.description: Grants permission to create usage in the specified bill scenario

actions.name: CreateWorkloadEstimate
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new Workload estimate

actions.name: CreateWorkloadEstimateUsage
actions.description: Grants permission to create usage in the specified workload estimate

actions.name: DeleteBillEstimate
actions.description: Grants permission to delete bill estimate

actions.name: DeleteBillScenario
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a bill scenario

actions.name: DeleteBillScenarioCommitmentModification
actions.description: Grants permission to delete newly added commitments from the specified bill scenario

actions.name: DeleteBillScenarioUsageModification
actions.description: Grants permission to delete newly added usage from the specified bill scenario

actions.name: DeleteWorkloadEstimate
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified workload estimate

actions.name: DeleteWorkloadEstimateUsage
actions.description: Grants permission to delete newly added usage from the specified workload estimate

actions.name: GetBillEstimate
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve details of a bill estimate including estimated cost

actions.name: GetBillScenario
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information associated with a bill scenario

actions.name: GetPreferences
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve applicable rate type preferences for the account

actions.name: GetWorkloadEstimate
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information associated with a workload estimate

actions.name: ListBillEstimateCommitments
actions.description: Grants permission to list commitments associated with the specified bill estimate

actions.name: ListBillEstimateInputCommitmentModifications
actions.description: Grants permission to list added or removed commitments for a specified bill estimate

actions.name: ListBillEstimateInputUsageModifications
actions.description: Grants permission to list added or modified usage for a specified bill estimate

actions.name: ListBillEstimateLineItems
actions.description: Grants permission to list result line items for a specified bill estimate

actions.name: ListBillEstimates
actions.description: Grants permission to list bill estimates

actions.name: ListBillScenarioCommitmentModifications
actions.description: Grants permission to list commitments included in a bill scenario

actions.name: ListBillScenarioUsageModifications
actions.description: Grants permission to list usage lines of a specified bill scenario

actions.name: ListBillScenarios
actions.description: Grants permission to list bill scenarios

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of tags for a resource

actions.name: ListWorkloadEstimateUsage
actions.description: Grants permission to list usage lines for the specified workload estimate

actions.name: ListWorkloadEstimates
actions.description: Grants permission to list workload estimates

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add a tag to a resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove a tag from a resource

actions.name: UpdateBillEstimate
actions.description: Grants permission to update bill estimate name and expiration date time

actions.name: UpdateBillScenario
actions.description: Grants permission to update name and expiration date time of the specified bill scenario

actions.name: UpdateBillScenarioCommitmentModification
actions.description: Grants permission to update commitment group of commitments in the specified bill scenario

actions.name: UpdateBillScenarioUsageModification
actions.description: Grants permission to update usage amount, usage hour, and usage group in the specified bill scenario

actions.name: UpdatePreferences
actions.description: Grants permission to update rate type preferences for the account

actions.name: UpdateWorkloadEstimate
actions.description: Grants permission to update name and expiration date time of the specified workload estimate

actions.name: UpdateWorkloadEstimateUsage
actions.description: Grants permission to update usage amount and usage group in the specified workload estimate based on the usage id
